data.title: K1 Speed Richmond
data.meta_description: If you've got the need for speed, visit K1 Speed Richmond for our world-famous indoor go kart racing experience! Our all-electric go karts are the fastest in the industry: our Junior Karts for kids 48" or taller can approach speeds of 20mph, while our Adult Karts for teens and adults 58" (4'10) or taller can reach 45mph! But indoor go kart racing isn't the only fun thing to do inside our upscale entertainment center. We also have a video game arcade, pool tables, and air hockey. And if you get hungry or thirsty while you're having fun, make a pit stop at our Paddock Lounge café, where we serve hamburgers, nachos, pizzas, wings, chicken tenders, and more! Plus, we offer a wide assortment of non-alcoholic beverages. And in the very near future, a full selection of beer and wine. Our center doesn't look like most karting places, either. We've got leather couches, an authentic IndyCar in our lobby, sophisticated black and white images from racing's history, and modern decor. This makes us a perfect unique venue for any type of event: from birthday parties for any age to corporate events/company parties, team building, bachelor parties, retirement parties, baby showers - you name it! Our two private event spaces are ideal for celebrations and meetings alike. So experience today what millions of racers have enjoyed since 2003 - get your adrenaline pumping with a trip to K1 Speed!
